alert.note: Alert for Carter (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 2:09PM MDT until June 27 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Carter County in southeastern Montana... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 208 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Ridgeway, or 38 miles south of Ekalaka, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rain, 60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Watch for water on the roads. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Carter County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
